title: LUX NEEDS DEBUFF
body: Lux ult cool down is op, the minimum cool down she gets on her ult is 20 seconds. Riot need to fix that man, that is so bs  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Just so we're clear, a debuff would mean a negative effect on opponents, not a reduction on Lux's timers.
Let's say what we mean, or go back to school if we don't understand.
Its rewarding lux players for good play and allowing lux to actually be able to carry, making her a more viable pick where she has not been for a long time.
Because let's nerf Lux instead of Zed.

by debuff do you mean nerf?
